name: 1-bit SafeCracker
description:
You take on a role of a blind safe-cracker who relies heavily on his sense of touch to crack open safes!

GAME MANUAL :

The Screen :
There are only three states for the screen.

-White : Means you are in a correct position.
-Black : Means you haven't reached the correct position.
-A Flash between Black and White : you successfully opened a safe!

Controls :

-SPACE : to continue/confirm when the screen is white, or reset the game and play again if it's flashing.

-There are multiple ways to turn/rotate the handle of the safe.

-The W & S keys
-The Up & Down Arrow Keys
-The mouse wheel

Development Notes :
made in approx 3 Hours, with Java (LWJGL,Slick2D), and GIMP for the cover and "screenshot".

Epilepsy Warning : the game has flashing lights, to test if it's safe for you, the game starts of flashing.You need java to run the game. Get that here.

Support the game by sharing or donating if you like it, thanks for reading this far down, it was fun participating the jam!
